title.rendered: Ghar bethe 5 min mai bnaye  asaan aloo tikki

content.rendered:
Material Required:-

1:- Aloo [potato]

2:- Cornstarch [makke ka aata]

3:- Oil [tel]

4:- Frying pan [tawa]

5:- Salt [namak]

Ab humare pass sab samaan lene ke baad humko sabse pehle aloo ko dhoo lena.

Uske baad aloo ko cheel kar hum ko usko ghis lena hai. Fir humko use ache se dubara dhoo lena hai jisse wo ache  se saaf ho jaye. Uske  baad humko usme 4 ṭablespoon cornstarch add krna h aur usko ache se usme mila lena hai jisse usme ek achi consistency aa jaye. Aur jese hi uske tkki shape banne lage uske thodi der rakh dena hai.

Iske baad humko ek frying pan mai oil lena hai[ oil bhut jyada nh bas itna ki humara aloo tikki ka base usme ache se aa jaye] ,oil medium garam krne ke baad usme hum apne cornstarch mile hue ghisa aloo ko ek tikki ke shape mai bna kr oil mai rkh dena hai and usko fry hone dena hai fir usko dubara ek baar palat kr dono taraf se ache se tal lena hai. Iske baad usko hum ek napkin mai nikaal le jisse uska oil nikal jaye and then usko serve krne ke liye hum usme chole laal aur hari chatni chat masala aur hari dhaniya se garnish krke mehmano ko serve kar skte hai. Ye tareeka sbse easy and fast hai.
